results.title: Juvenile acanthosis nigricans and insulin resistance.
results.text_hl: Dietary control and oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin hydrochloride@@@ markedly improved the lesions.

citations.NLM: Hermanns-Lê T, Hermanns JF, Piérard GE. Juvenile acanthosis nigricans and insulin resistance. Pediatr Dermatol. 2002 Jan-Feb;19(1):12-4. PMID: 11860562
citations.BibTeX: @article{11860562, title={Juvenile acanthosis nigricans and insulin resistance.}, author={Hermanns-Lê T and Hermanns JF and Piérard GE}, journal={Pediatr Dermatol}, volume={19}, number={1}, pages={12-4}}

results.title: The effect of alogliptin on pulmonary function in obese patients with type 2 diabetes inadequately controlled by metformin monotherapy
results.text_hl: In our research, we chose the initial dose (500 mg, bid po) of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and if the plasma sugar was inadequately controlled, the dose (1000 mg, bid po) of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was increased in the control group according to the guideline.

citations.NLM: Tai H, Wang MY, Zhao YP, Li LB, Dong QY, Liu XG, Kuang JS. The effect of alogliptin on pulmonary function in obese patients with type 2 diabetes inadequately controlled by metformin monotherapy Medicine (Baltimore). 2016 Aug;95(33):e4541. PMID: 27537577
citations.BibTeX: @article{27537577, title={The effect of alogliptin on pulmonary function in obese patients with type 2 diabetes inadequately controlled by metformin monotherapy}, author={Tai H and Wang MY and Zhao YP and Li LB and Dong QY and Liu XG and Kuang JS}, journal={Medicine (Baltimore)}, volume={95}, number={33}, pages={e4541}}
